basics.name: Sultan Gillani
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Sultan has around 8 years of experience in IT, Python & Ruby Development, Cloud computing such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud Platform, in DevOps through CI, CD tools like Jenkins, Gitlab CI, Ansible. He implemented DevOps practices to reduce the gap from development to production release. He has experience on working with Agile Scrum methodologies, setting up databases in AWS using RDS and configuring instance backups to S3 buckets. He has hands on experience in using configuration management tools like Vagrant, Packer, & Ansible. He has experience in working with Version control systems like Gitlab, GitHub, Bitbucket, & SVN. He has experience in Jenkins and Gitlab CI to perform Nightly builds, Milestone builds and Continuous Integration. He implemented Docker based Continuous Integration and Deployment Frameworks. He has written docker files and created docker images to deploy application into docker containers. He has installed, configured, modified, tested, and deployed applications on Apache Webservers, Nginx and IIS. He has knowledge in using Build Automation tools like Team City, Travis CI, Gitlab CI, and Jenkins. He has been involved in Shell scripts for compilation and deployment processes and automation.

highlights: Maintain the product demo tool that allows potential customers to easily test-drive a full version of the security appliance product via an AWS based instance.
Provide leadership in DevOps, Infrastructure-as-code, and CI/CD methodologies and techniques including configuration management, change control and full repeatability.
Managed and Configured the companies full stack of DevOps tools such as Jenkins, GitHub, AWS, & Ansible, and created various Docker images, and ansible playbooks.
Converted a fully managed Jenkins master instance from a pure freestyle implementation to Jenkins pipelines, utilizing declarative pipeline syntax for all production repositories.
Created new jenkins infrastructure to utilize multiple jenkins nodes, ensuring a high available Jenkins cluster.
Created the companies first Jenkins Shared Library to consolidate pipeline code and simplify the build and deployment process, utilizing the groovy programming language.
Converted the OpenBSD production environment to linux to be able to utilize newly available devops tooling and configuration.
Maintained highly available VMware vSphere servers: i.e. vCenter, ESX, vSAN and NSX, including maintenance and reconfiguration.
Worked extensively in package management and created custom OpenBSD ports packages for production environments.
Performed front-end development for the React/Redux based security appliance UI.
Performed back-end development for the Ruby/Sinatra based security appliance, utilizing object oriented programming.
Helped maintain and use RSpec/Capybara based software testing suite to validate UI correctness.
Used proactive approach to ensure 99.99% availability of production environment on hybrid infrastructure environment.
Configured and Maintained DevOps tools like Jenkins, GitHub, TeamCity, & Ansible Created various configuration files.
Understanding of cloud web hosting infrastructure architectures which utilize relational & NoSQL (Mongo DB) databases.

Worked extensively on containerized nginx reverse proxy servers along with dynamic config provisioning for newly created containers and on dynamic provisioning of LetsEncrypt certificates for custom URLs. Parsing, Indexing, Searching - Hot, Warm, Cold, Frozen bucketing.
Worked on an internal customized application deployment project. Setup AWS Services utilizing S3, and EC2.
Worked on web service API to get the data from webservers to on-premise SQL data base servers.
Created Python scripts for steady and continuous deployment, and integration.

Participated in project planning sessions with business analyst and team members to analyze client requirement. Created a zero-downtime environment, even during deployments, for the API services and greatly increased the flexibility of the system.
Debug and maintain all Jenkins jobs and their deployment servers.
Tuned SQL Statements using views and Stored Procedure. Designed Database objects including tables, procedures, views and database triggers on SQL Server Databases.

skills.name: Programming Languages: Python, Ruby, C#, VB.NET
Scripting Language: UNIX Shell Scripting, Groovy, & Python
Database & Visualization: PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, Mongo DB & Power BI
Network Technologies: NAT, VPC, Subnet Groups, TCP, UDP, MultiCast, Route Tables, CDNs, Firewalls
Version Control System: Git, Subversion, Mercurial
CI/CD, Automation and Monitoring Tools: Gitlab CI, Team City, Jenkins, JIRA, New Relic, & Travis CI.

interests.name: Taking Things apart and putting them back together.
